import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get asset change detail (POST)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/changes/{assetChangeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves details for a specific asset change audit log entry using POST method. This alternative to the GET method allows passing additional request options in the body.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetChangeId** - Obtain from [POST /api/v1.0/assets/changes/query](/docs/api/assets/query-asset-changes) and read `Items[].AssetChangeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query recent asset changes: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/changes/query](/docs/api/assets/query-asset-changes) -&gt; capture `AssetChangeId` from results.
2. Retrieve specific change details: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/changes/\{assetChangeId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-change-post).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetChangeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the change record to retrieve","example":"11111111-1111-4111-8111-111111111111","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"queryAssetChanges","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/assets/changes/query","responseField":"Items[].AssetChangeId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"description":"Optional request options for controlling the response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request parameters for querying asset change history","properties":{"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Filter by specific asset"},"ChangeTypes":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"nullable":true,"description":"Filter by change types"},"FromDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Start date for the query range"},"ToDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"End date for the query range"}},"title":"GetAssetChangesRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
